biotools.summary: Pplatform for scientific users to predict GIs (Genomic Islands ). This software package includes five commonly used tools, AlienHunter, IslandPath, Colombo SIGI-HMM, INDeGenIUS and Pai-Ida. It also includes an optimization program EGID that ensembles the result of existing tools for more accurate prediction.

bioschemas.name: GIST
